name: Indians vs Turkeys - Focus on the Arrow, Win the Contest!
name_original: Indians vs Turkeys - Focus on the Arrow, Win the Contest!
description:
+++ FREE for limited time ONLY! +++

“Great Time Killer”
“Beautiful Graphics”
“Awesome sound and cool music”
___________________________________

Thanksgiving Day is fast approaching. So it's time for you to make the most of your iPhone in the celebration spirit! Our exciting Indians vs Turkeys game is there to bring a pleasant holiday to your friends and family. It’s really an exciting game and you’re going to love it for sure!

Developed for iOS and iPad, this amazing Indians vs Turkeys game will teach and strengthen your memory skills. The game will make you more active, happier and patient with your family and friends. Many addictive levels, from easy to complex, are waiting for you to beat down. And of course you have a chance to beat the highest score.

+++ GAME FEATURES +++
Highly addictive and exciting
Easy Game Play
Beautiful Graphics
